attributes.action: keep the chocolate name we all love!!!
attributes.additional_details: we dont feel as if the cadburys name should be changed to mondolez international because cadburys has been around for years and we feel as if we should keep it like that and we want everyones help to keep it to that name. who would really buy a chocolate bar with a silly name like mondolez international?it will also cost to much money to put forward the name of mondolez international. trust the customers views because they are the views which matter.
